show_name: Koi Suru Tenshi Angelique: Kokoro no Mezameru Toki (TV)
other_title: 恋する天使アンジェリーク ～心のめざめる時～ (Japanese)
plot: A young girl named Ange is summoned to a Sacred Land and is chosen as the Legendary Etoile, whose mission is to save the newly-born Cosmos of the Holy Beast, which has recently fallen under a crisis. With the support of nine Guardians (who have the power of nine elements), she embarks on a journey to save the dying land of the Holy Beast and to discover her true self.
